bangumir 0.1.0

Get bangumi calendar

Source: R/bgm-calendar.R
bgm_calendar.Rd

Get bangumi calendar

bgm_calendar(format = c("list", "table", "default"))

Arguments

format

Result will be a list of json data when set to list (default), response() object when set to default. Set to table will convert the episode list to a data.frame for ease of use.

Value

A list of response content or a response() object according to the format option.

Examples

result <- bgm_calendar("table")

# Bangumi list on Monday
result$mon
